name: Untitled Olympic Runner
description:
~ LDJAM 45 : Start with Nothing ~

You find yourself in the middle of Olympic stadium. Totally naked.
The morale police has already been called and the only option you have - run for your life trying to collect some clothes along the way

Currently this is only a prototype.
The game is planned to be finished during the voting phase of Ludum Dare

via GIPHY
